PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-12902017-10-26,  ESDC,  ,  ,  , 
ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance (Fishing) Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE (FISHING) REGULATIONS in order to make necessary consequential changes to enable the implementation of the legislative provisions included in the Budget Implementation Act, 2017. These include amendments to current regulatory provisions in relation to the medical practitioners who are permitted to issue medical certificates, to harmonize the definitions of an eligible “family member”, “care” and “support” across the caregiving benefits, and to provide in the regulations references to the new benefit to provide care to critically ill adults.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2017-0227 Publication Date: 2017-11-15
AttachmentsAttachment
